#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;

const ll mod = 1e9 + 7;

ll pow(ll a, ll b) {
  if (b == 0) return 1;
  ll x = pow(a, b / 2ll);
  x = (x * x) % mod;
  return b & 1 ? (a * x) % mod : x;
}

int main() {
  int q;
  cin >> q;
  while (q--) {
    ll c, k;
    cin >> c >> k;
    ll p = 1, m = 0;
    while (p <= c) {
      p *= 2ll;
      ++m;
    }
    --m;
    cout << pow(m, k) << endl;
  }
}
